meanings.definition: A type of ornamental fish often kept in ponds.
meanings.sent1: The colorful kois swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching the kois swim around in the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the kois in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The kois glided through the water like living rainbows.
meanings.sent5: The children were mesmerized by the beauty of the kois.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'koi', referring to more than one of these fish.
meanings.sent1: We saw a school of colorful kois in the pond.
meanings.sent2: The kois in the garden pond looked vibrant and lively.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors admired the collection of kois in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The kois seemed to dance together in the water.
meanings.sent5: The pond was filled with the graceful movements of the kois.
